name: #BLESSED
description:
TOUCHSCREEN RECOMMENDED! Play as the Jehovah's Witness preachers with the ultimate goal of converting the entire neighbourhood to your good cause. But the Mormons have the same goal! Uh oh! Send your preachers into the area strategically in order to convert house by house, making sure that those that you have already converted stay true to your cause.

The first team to convert the entire neighbourhood to their cause wins the game and salvation.
